header.headline: Belgrade Airport Parking.
header.paragraph: Reserve a private parking spot at Nikola Tesla Airport with just two clicks, and park your vehicle from
header.bookingButtonIcon: Free transfer from parking to airport

sectionOne.headline: Airport Parking: simple and from
sectionOne.paragraphOne: Parking at Nikola Tesla Airport doesn't have to be complicated or expensive. In fact, for not more than
sectionOne.paragraphTwo: (the more days, the cheaper it gets), you can park your car at the Belgrade Airport.

sectionTwo.iconOneParagraph: The parking fee includes a free transfer to and from the airport. Once you park with us, all you have to do is enjoy your trip. We'll take care of the rest.
sectionTwo.iconTwoParagraph: Our Belgrade Airport parking is even cheaper than taxis. On average, for the price of a taxi in both directions, you can park with us for about 10 days.
sectionTwo.iconThreeParagraph: with us is very easy. Choose a date, fill in your details and that's it. Your parking spot is reserved.

sectionThree.paragraph: With Carport, the whole process is simple. We've made sure that everything from reserving parking to transfer is easy. If you have any questions, our team is always available to help you.
sectionThree.stepOne: You will receive an e-mail from us with detailed information. Payment will be made on the parking in cash or by card.
sectionThree.stepTwo: After reserving, before the day of your arrival, our team will contact you for all details related to airport parking.
sectionThree.stepThree: Park your car on the day of the reservation. After that, we will take you to the airport and wait for you on the day of your return. Completely free of charge.

sectionSix.headline: Travel in peace. Your car
sectionSix.iconOneParagraph: Our parking is under video surveillance 24/7. As long as it is on our parking lot, your vehicle is safe.
sectionSix.iconTwoParagraph: Our partners at the parking lot are available 0-24h. In case of any questions while you're on your trip, our team will gladly help you.
sectionSix.iconThreeParagraph: Your vehicle is safe with us. Our parking lot is enclosed and well-lit, and our partners at the parking lot are always on site.

sectionSeven.headline: Airport parking price:
sectionSeven.paragraph: The price for Belgrade airport parking for the first day is 700 RSD. Every subsequent day, the day becomes cheaper.
sectionSeven.tableFootnote: *Sample prices for up to 10 days. For longer periods, see the price list.

sectionEight.headline: Don't miss out on promotions and other perks.
sectionEight.paragraph: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay informed about all promotions, contests and other perks for registered clients.
sectionEight.formLegal: I want to receive notifications about the latest products, discounts and promotions (unsubscribe possible at any time).

sectionNine.headline: Frequently asked
sectionNine.faqOneTitle: Where is the airport parking located?
sectionNine.faqOneAnswer: Our parking is located just three minutes drive from the airport, in Surčin. More information, as well as a direct link to Google Maps, can be found
sectionNine.faqTwoTitle: Until what time on the day of the reservation do I need to park my vehicle?
sectionNine.faqTwoAnswer: When you make a reservation, the reservation is valid for the entire day. There is no specific parking time, as this depends on your flight time, etc. After making a reservation, our team will contact you before the day of parking. We will then agree on the parking and transfer time.
sectionNine.faqThreeTitle: Can I change or cancel my parking spot reservation?
sectionNine.faqThreeAnswer: Yes, you can change or cancel your parking spot reservation, but please do so at least 24 hours before the start of the reserved time.
sectionNine.faqFourTitle: Is a parking spot reservation mandatory?
sectionNine.faqFourAnswer: Yes. Without a reservation, we cannot guarantee a parking spot.
sectionNine.faqFiveTitle: How much does airport parking cost?
sectionNine.faqFiveAnswer: Parking for one day costs 700 RSD. From the second day, the day becomes cheaper. More detailed information and exact prices per day can be found

pagePricing.headline: Airport parking Belgrade
pagePricing.paragraphTwo: Belgrade (Nikola Tesla airport). Prices start at 700rsd for the first day and get cheaper for each additional day. If you want to park for more than 30 days, we offer special discounts. In that case, contact us at
pagePricing.tableFootnote: *For periods longer than 30 days, please contact us:

pageServices.headline: Our
pageServices.paragraphOne: In addition to airport parking services, we also provide other services related to it. Learn more about all of our services.
pageServices.navHeadline: Click on the title to go directly to the service.
pageServices.parkParagraph: Located near the Nikola Tesla Airport in Belgrade, our airport parking offers a daily rate from 250rsd. We have made it simple to reserve a parking spot with just a few clicks. Our enclosed parking lot is under video surveillance.
pageServices.transferParagraph: As part of our parking services, we also offer a complimentary airport transfer. Once you have reserved your parking spot, your transfer is also reserved. We will drive you and your luggage to the airport immediately after you park your vehicle. Similarly, we will come to pick you up at the airport when you land and drive you back to the parking lot to retrieve your vehicle.
pageServices.washParagraph: If desired, you can also order an exterior car wash during the reservation process for your parking spot. In this case, our team will wash your vehicle and have it ready for you when you return from your trip.

pageLocation.headline: Location
pageLocation.paragraph: Our parking is located just a 3-minute drive from the Belgrade airport.
pageLocation.faqOneTitle: Where is the airport parking located?
pageLocation.faqOneAnswer: Our parking is located just three minutes away from the airport, in Surcin. You can find more information, as well as a direct link to Google Maps,
pageLocation.faqTwoTitle: How do I reserve a transfer?
pageLocation.faqTwoAnswer: The transfer is included in the price and is considered a standard service as part of the airport parking. Before the day of parking, our team will contact you regarding details. In that conversation, depending on the time you need to be at the airport, we will schedule the parking time and the transfer time to and from the airport.
pageLocation.faqThreeTitle: Can I change or cancel my parking reservation?
pageLocation.faqThreeAnswer: Yes, you can change or cancel your parking reservation, but please do so at least 24 hours before the start of the reserved time.
pageLocation.faqFourTitle: Is reserving a parking spot required?
pageLocation.faqFourAnswer: Yes, without a reservation we cannot guarantee a parking spot.
pageLocation.faqFiveTitle: Is the transfer included from the airport to the parking as well?
pageLocation.faqFiveAnswer: Yes. Just as we drive you from the parking to the airport, we also drive you from the airport to the parking. During the phone conversation in which we define the parking time, we also define the flight landing time when you return. Then we will wait for you at the airport and drive you safely to your vehicle.

pageFaq.headline: Frequently asked
pageFaq.paragraph: Here you will find answers to all frequently asked questions. If you can't find an answer, please
pageFaq.navHeadline: Click on the title to go directly to the section.
pageFaq.parkingOneTitle: Where is the airport parking located?
pageFaq.parkingOneAnswer: Our parking is located just three minutes away from the airport, in Surcin. You can find more information, as well as a direct link to Google Maps,
pageFaq.parkingTwoTitle: What is the latest time I can park my vehicle on the day of my reservation?
pageFaq.parkingTwoAnswer: When you make a reservation, it is valid for the entire day. There is no specific parking time, as it depends on your flight time, etc. After making a reservation, and before the day of parking, our team will contact you. Then we will arrange the parking and transfer time.
pageFaq.parkingThreeTitle: Can I change or cancel my parking reservation?
pageFaq.parkingThreeAnswer: Yes, you can change or cancel your parking reservation, but please do so at least 24 hours before the start of the reserved time.
pageFaq.parkingFourTitle: How much does airport parking cost?
pageFaq.parkingFourAnswer: Parking for one day costs 700rsd. Starting from the second day, the price is cheaper. For more detailed information and exact prices per day, you can find it
pageFaq.bookingOneTitle: How do I reserve a parking spot?
pageFaq.bookingOneAnswer: You can reserve a parking spot online. You just need to select the parking date and the date you will be picking up your vehicle. After that, you will see a button with the price. After clicking on that button, you will be directed to a form. Fill in the information and that's it. You can make a reservation
pageFaq.bookingTwoTitle: Can I make a reservation over the phone?
pageFaq.bookingTwoAnswer: Unfortunately no. Carport only offers online reservations. However, we are available for any questions you may have. Please send us an email with your inquiry and we will respond as soon as possible. E-Mail:
pageFaq.bookingThreeTitle: What happens after I make a reservation?
pageFaq.bookingThreeAnswer: After making a reservation, and before the day of parking, our team will contact you by phone for other details. In that conversation, you will arrange the parking time, transfer details, etc.
pageFaq.bookingFourTitle: Is reserving a parking spot required?
pageFaq.bookingFourAnswer: Yes. Without a reservation, we cannot guarantee a parking spot.
pageFaq.paymentOneTitle: Where and what are the payment options?
pageFaq.paymentOneAnswer: Payment is made on-site, at the time of parking or when picking up the vehicle. You can pay cash or with any common credit/debit cards.
pageFaq.paymentTwoTitle: Are there any special discounts for regular customers?
pageFaq.paymentTwoAnswer: For regular customers or for parking for more than 30 days, we have special prices. In that case, please send us an email with your inquiry and we will respond as soon as possible. E-mail:
pageFaq.paymentThreeTitle: Is payment required at the time of reservation?
pageFaq.paymentThreeAnswer: No. Payment is made at the parking, when you park your car.

pageContact.headline: Contact and information about Carport
pageContact.carportInfo: Carport is an online platform that connects customers with companies that offer parking services. Therefore, it is responsible only for maintaining the technical and marketing needs of the platform. If you want to contact us, you can do so via email:
pageContact.partnerParagraph: For any questions regarding parking and the company, please contact our partner company directly.

pageTerms.headline: Terms of Service for Carport platform
pageTerms.introParagraph: Carport is a platform that connects users with providers of parking spots near the Belgrade airport. By booking a parking spot, you accept the following terms:
pageTerms.firstTermListingOne: Bookings are made online and payments are made in cash on the spot.
pageTerms.firstTermListingTwo: Cancellations can be made up to 24 hours before the start of the booked day. If the user does not cancel the booking within this time frame, they are obliged to pay the full price of the parking spot.
pageTerms.secondTermHeadline: Responsibilities of users and parking spot providers
pageTerms.secondTermListingOne: Carport is not responsible for the conditions of parking agreed upon between the user and the parking spot provider.
pageTerms.secondTermListingTwo: Carport is not responsible for the behavior of the parking spot provider.
pageTerms.secondTermListingThree: The user is obliged to follow through with the booking, otherwise they will be obliged to pay the full price of the parking spot if they did not cancel it in a timely manner.
pageTerms.secondTermListingFour: Carport is not responsible in the event that the parking spot, although booked, is not available. The responsibility for this lies with the Carport partner. Contact information for the partner can be found
pageTerms.thirdTermListingOne: Carport has the right to use the email address of the user who made the booking for sending newsletters and marketing communications.
pageTerms.thirdTermListingTwo: Carport uses user data for analytical purposes, marketing (newsletters), and exclusively for the realization of bookings. Data is transferred to the appropriate partner for this purpose.
pageTerms.description: Carport reserves the right to change the terms of service at any time without prior notice to the user.

pageBookingSuccess.thankYou: Thank you for your order. We have sent you an E-Mail with further instructions.
pageBookingSuccess.message: Our partner will contact you by phone before the reserved parking date. In case you have any questions, contact us.
pageBookingSuccess.parking: The parking lot is located at:
